name: Forest Gnome
description: As a forest gnome, you have a natural knack for illusion and an inherent quickness and stealth.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Gnome Cunning
traits.description: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

traits.name: Speak with Small Beasts
traits.description: Through sounds and gestures, you can communicate simple ideas with Small or smaller beasts.

features.name: Natural Illusionist
features.description: You know the Minor Illusion cantrip. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

spells.name: Minor Illusion
spells.description: You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for 1 minute. The illusion also ends if you dismiss it as an action or cast this spell again.
